name: Run Dorothy Run
description: Run Dorothy Run is an immersive Endless Runner and Rhythm Virtual Reality (VR) game, with a cheeky take on the literary classic The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 4 Core 3.4GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1230 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
